custom_steps.title: Introduction
custom_steps.text: Today we're making a portobello mushroom.

custom_steps.title: Stuffing Ingredients
custom_steps.text: That's stuffed with cheddar cheese, cream cheese, bacon, and jalapenos. So delicious.

custom_steps.title: Preparation Overview
custom_steps.text: Here's how we're gonna make it.

custom_steps.title: Portobello Mushrooms
custom_steps.text: What I've got here is some beautiful portobello mushrooms.

custom_steps.title: Inspect Mushrooms
custom_steps.text: They look great, nice and large.

custom_steps.title: Remove Stems
custom_steps.text: I'm just gonna remove the stems here.

custom_steps.title: Detach Stems
custom_steps.text: So easy to remove, just gently pull them and they'll come right off.

custom_steps.title: Oil Mushrooms
custom_steps.text: So what I'm going to do is just oil them up a little bit.

custom_steps.title: Oil Both Sides
custom_steps.text: Oil both sides.

custom_steps.title: Season with Salt
custom_steps.text: I'm going to give it a little bit of a season with some salt.

custom_steps.title: Prepare Garlic
custom_steps.text: I'm going to start working on our aromatics. I've got some garlic here.

custom_steps.title: Smash Garlic
custom_steps.text: Just give it a smash.

custom_steps.title: Mince Garlic
custom_steps.text: One more, just mince that up.

custom_steps.title: Set Aside Garlic
custom_steps.text: Beautiful, set that to the side.

custom_steps.title: Prepare Jalapenos
custom_steps.text: You're gonna also cut up some jalapenos here.

custom_steps.title: Remove Jalapeno Stems
custom_steps.text: Just remove the stems.

custom_steps.title: Slice Jalapenos
custom_steps.text: Cut down the middle.

custom_steps.title: Remove Seeds
custom_steps.text: Just going to remove those seeds.

custom_steps.title: Seed Removal
custom_steps.text: That's where really all the heat lies.

custom_steps.title: Dice Jalapenos
custom_steps.text: We're going to do a small dice on these.

custom_steps.title: Chop Jalapenos
custom_steps.text: Another chop on them.

custom_steps.title: Saute Jalapenos and Garlic
custom_steps.text: We're gonna saute up these jalapenos and garlic.

custom_steps.title: Chop Mushroom Caps
custom_steps.text: As that begins to cook, we're gonna also chop up these beautiful caps of our mushrooms and just coarsely chop it.

custom_steps.title: Cook Mushroom Caps
custom_steps.text: This is gonna get cooked down anyway inside of our pan.

custom_steps.title: Chop Mushroom Stems
custom_steps.text: Same with our stems.

custom_steps.title: Add Mushrooms to Pan
custom_steps.text: Add your mushrooms to the pan.

custom_steps.title: Season with Salt
custom_steps.text: I'm going to give it a season of salt.

custom_steps.title: Generous Seasoning
custom_steps.text: Generous season.

custom_steps.title: Add Black Pepper
custom_steps.text: I'm gonna give it a little bit of black pepper.

custom_steps.title: Add More Oil
custom_steps.text: Just add a little bit more oil.

custom_steps.title: Mushrooms Absorb Oil
custom_steps.text: Mushrooms are like sponges so they really do pick up any liquid that you put it with or any oil or fat.

custom_steps.title: Cook Down Mushrooms
custom_steps.text: So that looks good, it's cooked down.

custom_steps.title: Transfer to Bowl
custom_steps.text: Transfer this over to a bowl.

custom_steps.title: Prepare Cream Cheese
custom_steps.text: All right, so let's talk about what we've got going on. We've got some cream cheese right here.

custom_steps.title: Add Cream Cheese
custom_steps.text: We're gonna add the cream cheese in. It's softened so that it's pliable.

custom_steps.title: Add Bacon and Cheddar
custom_steps.text: We're also going to add in our bacon and our lovely cheddar cheese.

custom_steps.title: Mix Ingredients
custom_steps.text: I'm just gonna give that a mix.

custom_steps.title: Divide Mixture
custom_steps.text: So look at that, really easy. We're going to divide this into thirds, just kind of eyeball it.

custom_steps.title: Stuff Mushrooms
custom_steps.text: Stack it up really nicely here. I'll actually bring this up so you guys can see.

custom_steps.title: Bake Mushrooms
custom_steps.text: So this is going to go into an oven, 350 degrees preheated, and it's going to cook for about 20 minutes.

custom_steps.title: Remove from Oven
custom_steps.text: We're gonna pull out our mushrooms out of the oven.

custom_steps.title: Smell Check
custom_steps.text: They smell fantastic.

custom_steps.title: Garnish with Parsley
custom_steps.text: Give us a little garnish of parsley.

custom_steps.title: Serve and Enjoy
custom_steps.text: We're going to dig in. Oh yes, that just gave me so much life. Super good, really creamy. Bacon is salty and perfect. I love that the bacon flavor is going all through that mushroom, just permeating and perfuming that mushroom so beautifully. The cheese is so creamy and it's actually light. As much stuff as we got going on inside of here, it's not heavy to eat. It's so, so good.

custom_steps.title: Conclusion
custom_steps.text: Guys, thanks for watching. I'm Son of a Southern Chef and I'll see you next time.
